item.title: News details emerge about Utah mom, 3 kids killed at their home
item.description: One child survived being shot in the head and is hospitalized with a severe brain injury, police said.

item.title: Thousands of Jews have left Israel since the October 7 attacks
item.description: There's concern about whether emigration after Oct. 7, 2023 will drive a "brain drain" in sectors like medicine and tech.
